scripts.clean: rimraf build dist && npm run clean:compile
scripts.clean:compile: rimraf src/**/*.map src/**/*.js src/**/*.d.ts tests/**/*.js tests/**/*.map tests/**/*.d.ts demo/**/*.js demo/**/*.map demo/**/*.d.ts
scripts.lint: npm run tslint && npm run stylelint
scripts.docs: npm run clean:compile && typedoc --out ./build/docs/ --plugin typedoc-plugin-as-member-of src tsd.d.ts && npm run docs:python
scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && (node -e "process.exit(process.env.PHOVEA_SKIP_TESTS === undefined?1:0)" || npm run test)
scripts.build: npm run build:prod && npm run build:python
scripts.build:python: rm -rf build/source && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && node buildPython.js && cp -r ./phovea_security_flask build/source/
scripts.predist: npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.dist: mkdirp dist && cd build && tar cvzf ../dist/phovea_security_flask.tar.gz --exclude "docs" * && cd ..&& npm run dist:python
scripts.predist:python: npm run build:python && npm run docs:python
scripts.prepare: echo 'dummy prepare since prepack has no dev dependencies'
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run build:prod
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag=next && git push --follow-tags
scripts.predist:web: npm run build:web && npm run docs:web
